verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> There were present <S%G3918><s%> <S%G5713><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> that season <S%G846><s%> <S%G2540><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> that told <S%G518><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him <S%G846><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the Galilaeans <S%G1057><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> had mingled <S%G3396><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Suppose ye <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> Galilaeans <S%G1057><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Galilaeans <S%G1057><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they suffered <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5754><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%>?

I tell <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, Nay <S%G3780><s%>: but <S%G235><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> ye repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5725><s%>, ye shall <S%G622><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G5698><s%>.

Or <S%G2228><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%>, upon <S%G1909><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the tower <S%G4444><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Shiloach <S%G4611><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> slew <S%G615><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, think ye <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G3778><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> sinners <S%G3781><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> that dwelt <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%>?

I tell <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, Nay <S%G3780><s%>: but <S%G235><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> ye repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5725><s%>, ye shall <S%G622><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G5698><s%>.

He spake <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%>; A certain <S%G5100><s%> man had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard <S%G290><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> and sought <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5723><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> thereon <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5627><s%> none <S%G3756><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> said he <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the dresser of his vineyard <S%G289><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, these three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5723><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> fig tree <S%G4808><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5719><s%> none <S%G3756><s%>: cut <S%G1581><s%> it <S%G846><s%> down <S%G1581><s%> <S%G5657><s%>; why <S%G2444><s%> <S%G2532><s%> cumbereth <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5719><s%> it <S%G846><s%> the ground <S%G1093><s%>?

And if <S%G2579><s%> <S%G3303><s%> it bear <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5661><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%>, well: and if not <S%G1490><s%>, then after that <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> thou shalt cut <S%G1581><s%> it <S%G846><s%> down <S%G1581><s%> <S%G5692><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, there was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of infirmity <S%G769><s%> eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> bowed together <S%G4794><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> wise <S%G3838><s%> lift up <S%G352><s%> <S%G5658><s%> herself.

And <S%G1161><s%> when Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> her <S%G846><s%>, he called <S%G4377><s%> <S%G5656><s%> her to him, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, Woman <S%G1135><s%>, thou art loosed <S%G630><s%> <S%G5769><s%> from thine <S%G4675><s%> infirmity <S%G769><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> <S%G5656><s%> her <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> she was made straight <S%G461><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5707><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the ruler of the synagogue <S%G752><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> with indignation <S%G23><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> that Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> had healed <S%G2323><s%> <S%G5656><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day, and said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto the people <S%G3793><s%>, There are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> men ought <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> to work <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5738><s%>: in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G5025><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%> and be healed <S%G2323><s%> <S%G5744><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.

The YY <S%G2962><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Thou hypocrite <S%G5273><s%>, doth <S%G3089><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> loose <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5719><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ox <S%G1016><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his ass <S%G3688><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the stall <S%G5336><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lead him away <S%G520><s%> <S%G5631><s%> to watering <S%G4222><s%> <S%G5719><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5713><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this woman <S%G5026><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> a daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Avraham <S%G11><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> hath bound <S%G1210><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, lo <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, these eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>, be loosed <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5683><s%> from <S%G575><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> bond <S%G1199><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> had said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> adversaries <S%G480><s%> <S%G5740><s%> were ashamed <S%G2617><s%> <S%G5712><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5707><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the glorious things <S%G1741><s%> that were done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5740><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> said he <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, Unto what <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> like <S%G3664><s%>? and <S%G2532><s%> whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I resemble <S%G3666><s%> <S%G5692><s%> it <S%G846><s%>?

It is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard seed <S%G4615><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> garden <S%G2779><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it grew <S%G837><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> waxed <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> <S%G1519><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> lodged <S%G2681><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the branches <S%G2798><s%> of it <S%G846><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I liken <S%G3666><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>?

It is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and hid <S%G1470><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G4568><s%> of meal <S%G224><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> was leavened <S%G2220><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, are there few <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3641><s%> that be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5746><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>,

Strive <S%G75><s%> <S%G5737><s%> to enter in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5629><s%> at <S%G1223><s%> the strait <S%G4728><s%> gate <S%G4439><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, will seek <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5692><s%> to enter in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5629><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G2480><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be able <S%G2480><s%> <S%G5692><s%>.

When once <S%G575><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> the master of the house <S%G3617><s%> is risen up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hath shut <S%G608><s%> <S%G5661><s%> to the door <S%G2374><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye begin <S%G756><s%> <S%G5672><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5760><s%> without <S%G1854><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to knock <S%G2925><s%> <S%G5721><s%> at the door <S%G2374><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, open <S%G455><s%> <S%G5657><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he shall answer <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and say <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5692><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%>:

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall ye begin <S%G756><s%> <S%G5698><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, We have eaten <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5627><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunk <S%G4095><s%> <S%G5627><s%> in thy <S%G4675><s%> presence <S%G1799><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast taught <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> streets <S%G4113><s%>.

There <S%G1563><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth <S%G3599><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> ye shall see <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5667><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Yitz'chak <S%G2464><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> yourselves thrust <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5746><s%> out <S%G1854><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, there are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> first <S%G4413><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> last <S%G2078><s%>.
